title: Looking for Casters

embed.description: BACK BY POPULAR DEMAND!! Oceania's very own Twisted Treeline tournament is back and better than ever. Everyone is free to participate in this event. Prizing to be confirmed by Riot. This tournament will be held every month unless it clashes.

body:
Not sure if this is the right thread but...

I am looking for 5 casters of any experience to help stream an upcoming tournament.
This is the only competitive 3v3 tournament run on OCE servers.
Casting experience is not required but a thorough knowledge of the game is.

replies.body: I mained casters in Season 2, I can help.
yea brah ill call out the gs with my dank phrases. #banking and ganking
